title: Would Georgia Bill Expand Ban On Free Food, Water For Voters Waiting in Line?
subtitle: The Secretary of State calls the so-called "line warming" a form of illegal voter intimidation.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In March 2021, Georgia lawmakers were considering a bill that would update existing laws that prohibit offering gifts to voters at polls to explicitly include language that would make giving food or water to voters standing in line a misdemeanor crime, no matter the circumstances.
